question: At the end of cold war Francis Fukuyama constructed the thesis of ‘end of history’ which meant?
option1: The world would no longer be unfolding events
option2: The tension and conflict would cease to exist at global level
option3: Ideological struggles had come to an end
option4: Ideological struggles would be waged with new vigour
answer: Ideological struggles had come to an end
explanation: The End of History and the Last Man is a 1992 book by Francis Fukuyama, expanding on his 1989 essay “The End of History?” published in the international affairs journal The National Interest in which Fukuyama argues that the advent of Western liberal democracy may signal the endpoint of humanity’s sociocultural evolution and the final form of human government.
